txt.en:
'The journal you found is full of the rantings of a mad man. It will take me some time to unravel what he has been up to, but I was able to make out that he has been placing more of his crystals around other creatures in the Gap, in hopes of afflicting them with the same power and madness.'

She shows you a page of the book.

'Look here. That is no Warg, but a sabre-tooth! [placeholder], you must find the crystals and destroy them. We need not make sword-mouthed cats even more dangerous. Speak to Nósni, about where the beasts are lurking.'

Clovengap mist-stalkers and sabre-tooth cats can be found in the vineyards in eastern Clovengap.\n\nMother Amma has asked you to look into whether the Angmarim have managed to corrupt the sabre-tooth cats that prowl Maranazhâr.
Mother Amma is in Hagbuth, in south-eastern Clovengap.\n\nYou should tell Mother Amma what you found in the vineyards.
Drained crystals, and a dead Angmarim

This appears to be an account of the sorceress Iuvár's attempts at using the crystals on the sabre-tooth cats of Clovengap.

'We are being sent back to the vineyards with more crystals. Bruidalg insists I keep trying, no matter how many of my underlings the blasted cats devour. He gave me an adjustment to the ritual at least, so perhaps this time we shall have more luck.'

As you flip through the pages, a familiar looking piece of torn paper flutters loose.
DNT - Defeat Angmarim in the Clovengap vineyards ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Aye, I have seen the creatures of which you speak. They glide in and out of the mists like unholy shadows, striking with talons and fangs the size of my arms! Be careful if you go pursuing those cats. You will find them north of here, among the crumbling arches of the old vineyards.'
DNT - Defeat Angmarim in the Clovengap vineyards ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Beneath the crumbling arches of ancient vineyards prowls a deadly beast. Has the corruption of the sarrowstones spread to this already formidable foe?
Deadly sabre-cats prowl the Maranazhâr vineyards in eastern Clovengap.\n\nLook for more clues as to whether the Angmarim have managed to corrupt the sabre-tooth cats.
Nósni is located in Hagbuth.\n\nMother Amma has asked you to speak to Nósni.

In the crumbling vineyards of Maranazhâr, you have discovered an Angmarim waggon.\n\nThe Angmarim have intentions of creating abominations out of the already fierce sabre-tooth cats! You should defeat the Angmarim!
The Angmarim experiments were going to take place in the vineyards.\n\nWith the Angmarim sorceress Iuvár defeated, you should look for clues about their experiments.
DNT - 'Foul creatures. Gundabad is no home for them! \n\n'Oh, hoo! I see the stench of the crystals has not improved. Let us see what you have brought.'
Continue searching for signs of corruption
